comments:
3.2 RC5

An editor using a Form control got disposed while Form.setBusy(true) was in effect.  It generated the following.
I suggest checking isDisposed() within the syncExec before calling redraw().


!ENTRY org.eclipse.ui 4 0 2006-06-22 14:02:07.421
!MESSAGE Widget is disposed
!STACK 0
org.eclipse.swt.SWTException: Widget is disposed

I am having problems reproducing this in 3.3. Nevertheless, I placed a few more paranoid checks for 'isDisposed' beyond the ones that already exist. Please reopen if it happens again.
